name: love-story
description: Love Story - Chat App with Admin Dashboard

scripts.dev:concurrently: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "app-backend,app-frontend,admin-backend,admin-frontend" -c "blue,green,magenta,cyan" "npm run dev:app-backend" "npm run dev:app-frontend" "npm run dev:admin-backend" "npm run dev:admin-frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:app && npm run install:admin
scripts.install:app: cd chat-app && npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.install:admin: cd chat-app-admin && npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
